00095 #ifndef HEADER_SHA_H
00096 #define HEADER_SHA_H
00097 
00098 #include <openssl/e_os2.h>
00099 
00100 #ifdef OCTEON_OPENSSL
00101 #include <stdio.h>
00102 #include "cvmx.h"
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00106 extern "C" {
00107 #endif
00108 
00109 #if defined(OPENSSL_NO_SHA) || (defined(OPENSSL_NO_SHA0) && defined(OPENSSL_NO_SHA1))
00110 #error SHA is disabled.
00111 #endif
00112 
00113   /*
00114    * !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
00115    * ! SHA_LONG has to be at least 32 bits wide. If it's wider, then !
00116    * ! SHA_LONG_LOG2 has to be defined along.                        !
00117    * !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
00118    */
00119 
00120 #if defined(OPENSSL_SYS_WIN16) || defined(__LP32__)
00121 #define SHA_LONG unsigned long
00122 #elif defined(OPENSSL_SYS_CRAY) || defined(__ILP64__)
00123 #define SHA_LONG unsigned long
00124 #define SHA_LONG_LOG2 3
00125 #else
00126 #define SHA_LONG unsigned int
00127 #endif
00128 
00129 #define SHA_LBLOCK  16
00130 #define SHA_CBLOCK  (SHA_LBLOCK*4)  /* SHA treats input data as a
00131                                          * contiguous array of 32 bit
00132                                          * wide big-endian values. */
00133 #define SHA_LAST_BLOCK  (SHA_CBLOCK-8)
00134 #define SHA_DIGEST_LENGTH 20
00135 
00136   typedef struct SHAstate_st {
00137     SHA_LONG h0, h1, h2, h3, h4;
00138     SHA_LONG Nl, Nh;
00139     SHA_LONG data[SHA_LBLOCK];
00140     int num;
00141 #ifdef OCTEON_OPENSSL
00142     uint64_t E, F, G;
00143 #endif
00144   } SHA_CTX;
00145 
00146 #ifndef OPENSSL_NO_SHA0
00147   int SHA_Init (SHA_CTX * c);
00148   int SHA_Update (SHA_CTX * c, const void *data, unsigned long len);
00149   int SHA_Final (unsigned char *md, SHA_CTX * c);
00150   unsigned char *SHA (const unsigned char *d, unsigned long n,
00151     unsigned char *md);
00152   void SHA_Transform (SHA_CTX * c, const unsigned char *data);
00153 #endif
00154 #ifndef OPENSSL_NO_SHA1
00155   /*
00156    * initializes a SHA_CTX structure
00157    *
00158    *@param Reference to SHA_CTX structure
00159    */
00160   int SHA1_Init (SHA_CTX * c);
00161   int SHA1_Update (SHA_CTX * c, const void *data, unsigned long len);
00162   int SHA1_Final (unsigned char *md, SHA_CTX * c);
00163   unsigned char *SHA1 (const unsigned char *d, unsigned long n,
00164     unsigned char *md);
00165   void SHA1_Transform (SHA_CTX * c, const unsigned char *data);
00166 #endif
00167 
00168 #define SHA224_DIGEST_LENGTH 28
00169 #define SHA256_DIGEST_LENGTH 32
00170 #define SHA224_CBLOCK 64
00171 #define SHA256_CBLOCK 64
00172 
00173   typedef struct SHA256state_st {
00174 #ifdef OCTEON_OPENSSL
00175     uint64_t iv[4];
00176     uint64_t totalin;
00177     /* input length need not be a multiple of 64 */
00178     uint8_t pbuf[64];
00179     uint64_t plen;
00180     /* Negative Test Case Handling */
00181     uint32_t done;
00182     /* sha224=0;sha256=1 */
00183     uint32_t sha256;
00184 #endif
00185   } SHA256_CTX;
00186 
00187 #ifndef OPENSSL_NO_SHA256
00188   int SHA224_Init (SHA256_CTX * c);
00189   int SHA224_Update (SHA256_CTX * c, const void *data, size_t len);
00190   int SHA224_Final (unsigned char *md, SHA256_CTX * c);
00191   unsigned char *SHA224 (const unsigned char *d, size_t n,
00192     unsigned char *md);
00193   int SHA256_Init (SHA256_CTX * c);
00194   int SHA256_Update (SHA256_CTX * c, const void *data, size_t len);
00195   int SHA256_Final (unsigned char *md, SHA256_CTX * c);
00196   unsigned char *SHA256 (const unsigned char *d, size_t n,
00197     unsigned char *md);
00198   void SHA256_Transform (SHA256_CTX * c, const unsigned char *data);
00199 #endif
00200 
00201 #define SHA384_DIGEST_LENGTH 48
00202 #define SHA512_DIGEST_LENGTH 64
00203 #define SHA384_CBLOCK 128
00204 #define SHA512_CBLOCK 128
00205 
00206   typedef struct SHA512state_st {
00207 #ifdef OCTEON_OPENSSL
00208     uint64_t iv[8];
00209     uint64_t totalin;
00210     /* input length need not be a multiple of 128 */
00211     uint8_t pbuf[128];
00212     uint64_t plen;
00213     /* Negative Test Case Handling */
00214     uint32_t done;
00215     /* sha384=0;sha512=1; */
00216     uint32_t sha512;
00217 #endif
00218   } SHA512_CTX;
00219 
00220 #ifndef OPENSSL_NO_SHA512
00221   int SHA384_Init (SHA512_CTX * c);
00222   int SHA384_Update (SHA512_CTX * c, const void *data, size_t len);
00223   int SHA384_Final (unsigned char *md, SHA512_CTX * c);
00224   unsigned char *SHA384 (const unsigned char *d, size_t n,
00225     unsigned char *md);
00226   int SHA512_Init (SHA512_CTX * c);
00227   int SHA512_Update (SHA512_CTX * c, const void *data, size_t len);
00228   int SHA512_Final (unsigned char *md, SHA512_CTX * c);
00229   unsigned char *SHA512 (const unsigned char *d, size_t n,
00230     unsigned char *md);
00231   void SHA512_Transform (SHA512_CTX * c, const unsigned char *data);
00232 #endif
00233 
00234 #ifdef OCTEON_OPENSSL
00235   /* Octeon MIPS Specific Crypto Implementation Need,Not an API */
00236 #define uint64_t_mul(abhi,ablo,a,b) \
00237 {\
00238     asm volatile("dmultu %[rs],%[rt]" :: [rs] "d" (a), [rt] "d" (b) );\
00239     asm volatile("mfhi %[rd] " : [rd] "=d" (abhi) : );\
00240     asm volatile("mflo %[rd] " : [rd] "=d" (ablo) : );\
00241 }
00242 #endif

00245 #define sha_assert(aexpr,rexpr) {if(!(aexpr)) {printf("Assertion %s Failed\n",#aexpr); return rexpr ;}}
00246 #endif

00248 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00249 }
